model

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImplementsBD

    public interface UserDAO
    Interface that defines the basic user data access operations (DAO).

    Any class implementing this interface must provide functionality for user authentication and user management operations in the system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Profile checkUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Verifies user credentials and returns the corresponding profile.
      boolean deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes a user from the system.

      Retrieves all users from the system.

      Inserts a new user into the system.

      Modifies an existing administrator's information in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • checkUser

        Profile checkUser(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)
        Verifies user credentials and returns the corresponding profile.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to verify
        password - the password to verify
        Returns:
        the Profile object if credentials are valid, null otherwise

      • modifyUser

        boolean modifyUser(User user)
        Modifies an existing user's information in the system.
        Parameters:
        user - the User object containing updated information
        Returns:
        true if the modification was successful, false otherwise

      • modifyAdmin

        boolean modifyAdmin(Admin user)
        Modifies an existing administrator's information in the system.
        Parameters:
        user - the Admin object containing updated information
        Returns:
        true if the modification was successful, false otherwise

      • modifyPassword

        boolean modifyPassword(Profile user,
                       java.lang.String passwd)
        Modifies a user's password in the system.
        Parameters:
        user - the Profile whose password will be changed
        passwd - the new password to set
        Returns:
        true if the password was successfully modified, false otherwise

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(User user)
        Deletes a user from the system.
        Parameters:
        user - the User object to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the user was successfully deleted, false otherwise

      • getAllUsers

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,User> getAllUsers()
        Retrieves all users from the system.
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing all users with their profile codes as keys

      • insertUser

        Profile insertUser(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password)
        Inserts a new user into the system.
        Parameters:
        username - the username for the new user
        password - the password for the new user
        Returns:
        the created Profile if successful, null otherwise
